item.title: Thoughts
item.description: I'm passionate about computers, technology. I did my Masters (Computer Applications), started my career with C++. I moved on to .NET since its beginning and over the years I've worked with multitude of technologies, languages, frameworks and tools. As I reflect upon my past experiences, and with my continued learning I want to share them with you all. Some of the areas that are of interests to me (in no particular order)

item.title: Hello
item.description: I'm Vasu Balakrishnan, a passionate technologist, software development leader and technical architect. Welcome to my site. Stay tuned for updates, as I curate the content …

item.title: About me
item.description: Accomplished software development leader and architect with over 20 years of hands-on experience that includes analysis and design, architecture, development, and leading teams, building web, desktop, mobile, cloud-native applications and big data analytics. Passionate technologist dedicated to continuous learning and professional growth, mentoring talent, and improving development processes. Disclaimer: The opinions expressed herein are my own personal opinions and do not represent my employerâ€™s view in any way.
